name: Kill It Backwards
description:
This is my submission for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2!

This game is about killing bad guys! But the catch is, that you can only hurt enemies (and yourself) if you REWIND your bullet. That means the bullet will travel the opposite way. If you're not careful enough, you might just kill yourself...

Controls:

Aim, rewind and shoot with mouse

Move with WASD keys
